product_name: isimaCurls Don't Lie Curl Perfecting Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGive waves, curls and coils more of the hydration they crave with isima's Curl's Don't Lie Curl Perfector [Curls Don't Lie Perfeccionador de Rizos]. This lightweight cream works at the cortex and cuticle levels to transform curls from within.
details: DetailsBenefitsNourishes, hydrates and softensBoosts shine and tames frizzHydrates and protects strands from heat protection up to 450ﾂｰ FGives curls definition with no added crunchKey IngredientsGluconaBond邃｢: Cutting-edge technology is designed to recreate lost hydrogen and ionic bonds, reinforcing the internal structure of strandsFiberSeal邃｢: One-of-a-kind ingredient helps to smooth and seal cuticles that have been lifted due to treatments, heat tools and environmental stressLinseed + Chia Extract: Helps form a flexible network at the surface of hair, giving curls more hold and beautiful definitionSqualane: Biofermented from Brazilian sugar cane, this emollient replenishes hair with essential lipids for added moisture and shineGlycerin: Helps retain moisture, leaving the hair feeling beautifully hydratedResearch Results96 hours of anti-frizz protection.*5.9x less breakage from heat damage.*90% agree their hair feels softer.**85% agree their hair feels smoother and nourished.**86% agree their curls are more defined after 4 weeks of use.***based on a third-party study vs. control.**based on a third-party consumer study including 52 participants.Item 2635666How To UseSection hair and apply generously with clean hands to damp hair, distributing from mid-lengths to ends.Scrunch or diffuse to enhance waves or curls. Let air dry, or use a diffuser to style.Pre-caution: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Amodimethicone, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropylgluconamide, Squalane, Hydroxypropylammonium Gluconate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Sodium Gluconate, Panthenol, PVP, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Arginine, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Tartaric Acid, Caprylic Acid, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Xylitol, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Phenylalanine, Histidine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid, Coumarin, Geraniol, Rose ketones, Tetramethyl AcetyloctahydronaphthalenesShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Section hair and apply generously with clean hands to damp hair, distributing from mid-lengths to ends.Scrunch or diffuse to enhance waves or curls. Let air dry, or use a diffuser to style.Pre-caution: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: Wish there was more product for the price. It also does have a strong horchata scent lol that's how I can best explain it but it does fade away once hair dries down. This ranks in my top 2 for favorite hair products for curly hair along with Pattern.

reviews.headline: I would like to buy it again
reviews.comments: I love the product, but at the moment a was paying ty was supposed to recibes a special gift for my purchase, but the say they don't have any more.

reviews.headline: I'm hooked on this product
reviews.comments:
I was very skeptical when I purchased the curls don't lie.  I read both positive and negative reviews. The negative was that the persons hair frizzed. I was concerned but decided to try it. I have very curly hair and it frizzes easily and quickly especially in inclement weather. 
I applied the curls don't lie on wet hair and let it air dry, no diffuser used.  Hours later my hair was still curly with fresh curls and no frizz.  I'm hooked.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Have Curly hair and found this product to be wonderful, my curls were soft and defined. Perfect for humid weather.

reviews.headline: My curls definitely don't lie!
reviews.comments: I have fine, mid-back length curly hair.  Most styling products are heavy and leave my hair feeling crunchy and dirty - by the end of the day it's usually a tangled hot mess.  I used this product by itself and the results were shockingly amazing!  This product defines beautifully with soft, natural looking, voluminous curls.  It styled my hair effortlessly and only took 2 dime-sized pumps.  I love everything anout this product right down to the design!  Bonus: It smells really good!

reviews.headline: It was a no for me
reviews.comments: Love shakria but this curl cream was a no. I am giving it two stars bc the smell is good but the preformance of it was not good. Made my hair look super greacy and frizzy. I paried this with the leave in conditioner she created  & it made it even worse! Sadly i will be turning both items. For reference idk what type of curls i have but they are literal ringlets lol

reviews.headline: Amazing !!
reviews.comments: I really impressed with this !! My babygirl curly hair is so happy !! Finally we found a good product that really works!!

reviews.headline: Defined curls
reviews.comments: I have 2c-3a curls and the Isima products defined my curls like I have never seen them before! Very pretty! Although this product is a bit pricey, I will be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Smell is so pungent
reviews.comments: Purchased this yesterday and I wanted to love this based on packaging alone but my god the smell of this cream is incredibly strong and unpleasant! Reminds me of mens cologne 沽 Unfortunately will be returning

reviews.headline: Best Curl Cream I've Ever Used
reviews.comments: This is the best curl cream I have ever used. My curls have never looked better, and adding this is the only thing I changed in my routine. Very light weight and doesnt make me look greasy. The only negative is the scent is too strong. I hope they dial it back a bit, but I'm willing to overlook it becausw my curls look so good.

reviews.headline: Loveee
reviews.comments: Okayyy, Ms. SHAKIRA. She did her big one with this curl cream! It worked so well and gave me such defined and hydrating looking curls. I have naturally wavey hair so for this product to give me a more define looking curl, I was so impressed. The other curl creams I've used from other brands usually just make it more wavey but do not curl up my hair.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love this product. It really brings my curls out

reviews.headline: Excellent Product
reviews.comments: My curls are more defined, hair feels/ looks stronger, and all while smelling amazing.  I would recommend this product !

reviews.headline: Love this curl cream!
reviews.comments: It smells amazing and made my hair feel so silky.  I used it in conjunction with Rizos Strong hold gel and my curls held their shape all week!.

reviews.headline: SCENT TOO STRONG
reviews.comments: Buyer beware!!!! If you are sensitive to strong scents, perfumes, etc., sadly this is not for you. The curl cream works beautifully and it works as it should. I reas reviews online & saw that people talked mostly about the scent and thought "I'm aure it's not that bad, let's give it a whirl窶ｦ." Well, the scent took me on the ride of my life. It was SOO STRONG that all morning I felt as though I had just gotten off the spinning tea cups ride. Sadly, I will be returning this product and will not be repurchasing unless they come out with a curl cream that is much less scented

reviews.headline: Feather lightweight curl cream
reviews.comments:
This curl cream has replaced my Curlsmith featherlight, Curl talk, Bumble Bumble, Innersence and Kevin Murphy curl creams!!

Its hydrating, controls frizz and gives me volume to my 2c/3a curls.

reviews.headline: Best curl cream ever
reviews.comments: Let me tell you that at first I thought I was having an allergic reaction to the cream, my scalp felt tingly even tho I didn't apply it on my scalp, but very close to it, but my hair instantly started to curl(curls I never seen on my hair), so I kept using it, and the more I use it the more define my curls are, the tingly disappear after my 3rd/4th use, I definitely recommend this cream, my daughter has wavy hair and her hair is more define too, she loves it too, since I bought it, never loved my curls like right now with Curls don't lie, and once I used the diffuser窶ｦwow my hair were shorter because of more define curls shiner and bouncier, really love it, am about to finished my first bottle and I am ready to buy 2 more, its my every day product

reviews.headline: Good but a little heavy
reviews.comments: I have fine, thin, curly shoulder length hair. This is an ok curly cream, no crunchiness and it doesn't irritate my sensitive scalp. It doesn't really help with frizz, and it's a little too heavy for my hair. I like this hair care line, and I hope Shakira comes out with more hair styling products, especially one for volume. I also wish this came in a travel size like her other products, it makes it much more affordable to try.

reviews.headline: A++++++++ Tamed my mane
reviews.comments: I absolutely love it. Finally a curl cream that tames the frizz, smells delicious and keeps my curls feeling soft and hydrated.  I received many compliments.

reviews.headline: No frizz control
reviews.comments: I have curly/wavy hair and was excited to try this product since i have the same curl pattern as shakira. However living in a humid climate, it did NOT help. Too lightweight to hold a good curl and the smell was overpowering perfume smell. I had high hopes and sad this did not work for me.

I don't know if I Buy again
Made my hair feel and look greasy.

Great product for low maintenance hair routines!!
Great product I highly recommend it
Definitely a new staple in my routine.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Worked great for my 2B waves! Smells good and has great slip with my styling brush! Only takes a small amount, so the bottle should last awhile. Neat bottle with a twist to open and close cap. No cast to scrunch out and I ended up with soft and moisturized curls with just this product alone.
  
  I'll pair this with some gel and should have the perfect amount of hold!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great slip and hold

faceoff_negative.comments: I'll start off by saying, this product smelled lovely and although it didn't last long it did make the hair smell nice for a few hours. Packaging was interesting. It definitely looked like you were able to twist and open from the where there is a line in the middle of the cap but actually you just twist and open from the base, so I thought that was a poor design chose and can be confusing. For the overall product itself, it was very hydrating but gave no definition or bounce to the curl itself. Although it's super hydrating and there was no "crunch" texture it did make my hair a little frizzy. Overall, it's a nice product but not sure if it's a repurchase.
faceoff_negative.headline: Okay

rollup.name: Curls Don't Lie Curl Perfecting Cream
